title: Privacy Policy (India Standard)
why: Privacy Policy user ko batata hai ki data kahan store hota hai, kyu collect hota hai, aur user ka control kya hai. Ye trust + compliance ke liye required hai.
template: This Privacy Policy explains how {{appName}} collects, uses, and protects your personal data. We only collect information necessary to provide our services. If you have concerns, contact us at {{contactEmail}}.
